desc: Evolve Yourself is UK's Best Place To Buy Unique Healing Crystals, Tibetan & Crystal Singing Bowls, Orgone Pyramids, Lapis Lazuli Palm Stones, Native American Jewellery, Black Tourmaline Pendants, Crystal Gift Sets, Amethyst Druze, Crystal Bracelets and Pendants and many more! Free delivery for orders over £25.

layout.text: Sound has been utilized in various cultures for thousands of years as a tool for healing. Whether through the use of mantras as with the Hindis, the Icarus (medicine melodies) of various Indigenous peoples from Central and South America, or Pythagoras' use of interval and frequency, these various techniques all have the same intention: to move us from a place of imbalance to a place of balance.
